original_title: 2019 Easter Sunday attacks and victims commemorated at St. Anthony’s Shrine in Kochchikade
original_body_lines: Archbishop of Colombo Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith officiated at the fifth anniversary commemoration of the 2019 Easter Sunday attacks at St. Anthony’s Shrine in Kochchikade on Sunday. A large number of clergy from multiple faiths and devotees participated – Pix by Ruwan Walpola
